creator: paulotaylor@hotmail.com
text:
At first I though that it was the socket but it appears that it's in fact the
key that is null which is not checked for


Exception in thread "http-8080-4" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.tomcat.util.net.NioEndpoint$Worker.run(NioEndpoint.java:1443)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

I believe this has been fixed in 6.0.12, are you reporting this against an older
version?

http://people.apache.org/~remm/tomcat-6/v6.0.12/
creator: fhanik@apache.org

text:
Yeah, I checked against version 6.0.10

Cheers
creator: paulotaylor@hotmail.com
